name: Inside World
description:
It is a game about an astronaut who just landed on planet Earth which were being conquered by aliens.Uhm there is a little tiny bit of a problem he landed on a place called "The inside world Prison" which is where aliens lay eggs, so it is infested with aliens

Your mission is to get out of this "inside world" and get out to the "outside world" where humans are waiting for you

Disable all 5 terminals to open the door that leads to the outside world

Theme: Different worlds inside of planet Earth, a world where aliens stay and a world where humans are free

Tutorial Used: PlayerPrefs Save System

i used the System and it is working but it won't save the entire game

only the last saved player position will be saved

because i do not know if i can modify the script so i did not implement any special saving system
